title: Boosting the maximized output energy density of triboelectric nanogenerators
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01493F, Paper
Ru Guo, Xin Xia, Hang Luo, Dou Zhang, Yunlong Zi
A comprehensive strategy including charge excitation, interface insulation, and material screening was employed to achieve a record-high output energy density of 4.3 × 105 J m−3 for a triboelectric nanogenerator.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
